message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find a better price anywhere else.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. While I understand its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $850000? I'm hopeful we can reach a mutually beneficial arrangement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go down to $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and my initial offer. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

I appreciate your response, Alice. After careful consideration, I believe we can find common ground. Would it be possible to lower the price to $860000? This would still allow me to stay within my budget while providing you with a reasonable profit. I look forward to your thoughts on this proposal.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your desire to stay within your budget, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $870000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.

I appreciate your effort in negotiating, Alice. After reviewing our discussions, I believe we can achieve a fair compromise. Would it be possible to set the price at $865000? This would be a reasonable solution for both parties involved.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to find a mutually beneficial agreement. However, I'm not willing to go down to $865000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $880000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.

Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I've considered all the details and I believe we can reach a satisfactory conclusion. I am willing to propose a final price of $875000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
